name: Notion Employee Handbook
description: Start Your Employee Handbook With This Simple Page LayoutEditing PagesAll pages have mockups of a select policy in an employee handbook. All underlined text can be replaced with your company’s name, objectives, or statements — in addition to adding more information and blocks.How The Policy Index WorksThe first 1-2 paragraphs in each policy page have a red outline — they are synced blocks. These synced blocks are copied and pasted into Policy Index with a read more link back to the original page
features: For everynew pagecreate a synced block to place your summary inside (type → /sync).; After the summary is written, navigate to thecopy and syncbutton, then travel toPolicy Indexto paste the block inside. Now, whenever a policy summary is changed, it will also change in the index.
